file:"]}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"# Choose your provider\nANTHROPIC_API_KEY=your_key_here    # For Claude Opus 4.6\nOPENAI_API_KEY=your_key_here       # For GPT-5.3-Codex\nXAI_API_KEY=your_key_here          # For xAI Grok\n\nOPENCLAW_PORT=3000\nOPENCLAW_BIND=127.0.0.1            # Security: bind to localhost\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"agent.js"}],":"]}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"const { Agent } = require('openclaw')\n\nconst agent = new Agent({\n  name: 'MyFirstAgent',\n  model: 'claude-opus-4.6',  // or 'gpt-5.3-codex', 'grok'\n  skills: ['web-search', 'file-ops'],\n  platforms: ['terminal']     // Can also add 'slack', 'discord', 'telegram'\n})\n\nagent.start()\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Multi-Platform install code-runner\nopenclaw skill install file-manager\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Security YOUR_VT_KEY\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Adding Custom Skills"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg description: 'Greet the user by name',\n  handler: async (name) => {\n    return `Hello, ${name}! I'm powered by OpenClaw.`\n  }\n})\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Running Your Agent"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 agent.js\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":["Visit ",["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto localhost (127.0.0.1) unless remote access is needed"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Enable VirusTotal scanning for ClawHub skill installations"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Use the built-in code safety scanner"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Run skills in sandboxed environments"}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":["Keep OpenClaw updated:
